subject: Attention dear beneficiary.
body:
this is to inform you of your long overdue Payment outstanding in our
records. We saw your name in the Central Computer among list of unpaid
inheritance claims individuals and have to update your information’s
through this email contact for immediate confirmation. Your name
appeared among the beneficiaries who will receive a part payment of
the sum of$200,000,000.00 United States dollars to you, Credited to Online
Bank ATM Card account that was set up for you in Wells Fargo and it
has been approved already months ago.

However we received an email from one (Mr.John Husman) who told us
That he is your next of kin and that you died in a car accident last
four months back ago and he willing to pay the only charge of $60
Itunes gift card to received the fund $200,000,000.00 United States dollars
as your next of kin,

He has also submitted his contact information’s to the office
department for the delivery of your ATM Card to him as your inheritor.
We are now verifying by contacting your email address as we have in
our Bank records before we can make the delivery to him and for us to
conclude confirmation if you are dead or not.

Please, confirm response immediately to us before our action release
your ATM Card to him against your name listed out. Upon this, I
request you send the delivery charge $60 gift card Steam Wallet
card or itunes gift card and your full personal information as
soon as possible to our ATM Card Payment Center to enable them
finalize with the delivery of you ATM Card to you.

Payment $60 iTunes Gift Card Or Steam gift card Or Google gift card

scan copy code…
Your Full Names:_____________
Contact Address:_____________
Mobile Phone:_____________
Home Phone:_____________
Fax:_____________
Occupation:_____________
Marital Status:_____________
Age:_____________

If you are not dead send the payment $60 before contact us but if
we not hear from you till Tuesday means you are dead and give the fund
$200,000,000.00 United States dollars to (Mr.John Husman

In order to resolve this problem, Please contact ( Our ATM Card
Payment Center)immediately for the delivery of your ATM Card via their
below

Sincerely
Mr. Edward Glover
United Nations
Secretary General

subject: Re: Attention dear beneficiary.
body:
Hello! Thank you for reaching out with this information. Can you please provide more details about the overdue payment and how I can proceed to claim it?

Best wishes,
Lauren

subject: Re: Attention dear beneficiary.
body:

subject: Re: Attention dear beneficiary.
body:
i wish to inform you that I'm 100% sure and I'm giving you a 100% percent
guarantee that, once you make the payment for the issuing of your fund, you
won't be asked to pay any cent. So I advise you to trust me and follow the
procedure so you can be able to receive your fund. I promise you that you
will not regret trusting me on this transaction. So kindly get back to me
with your urgent response to proceed with the transaction.

Thank you.

body:
I'm very 100% sure that once you make the payment of $60 your atm card will
be delivered to you without any further delay ok?
